::Composer/Symphony::

     Composer walked out of the shuttle.  He grinned as he thought to
himself, "what luck!" This faction was the best out there!  He hoped this
was true.

       "Nice place....Good shields........I think I'll like it here, that
is, if your leader, Zardus, lets me in," Composer said.
